attributes.action: not withdraw the e-petitions page under any circumstances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now over a million people have signed the road pricing petition and there are media reports of ministers regretting setting this website up, I urge people to sign this petition to stop any attempt remove it.  This site is a valuable outlet for people's opinions and to withdraw it would deny the public that outlet.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
